featured.text: If one travels across three time zones, he needs about __________ hours to get over his jet lag problem.
A traveler who suffers from jet lag has problems in ___________.
Generally speaking, our biological clock is slightly disturbed if we just move into the next time zone, but jet lag becomes a problem once we have passed through three or four time zones.
A person may suffer the most serious case of jet lag when he takes a __________ journey.

definition.en_def: A jet is a fast-moving stream of liquid or gas, or an aircraft powered by jet engines.
definition.example: The jet flew high above the clouds.
